data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Jefferson Ferreira de Moraes signals a Bragantino throw-in in Ceara's half.
In the minute 1, Bragantino awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Ceara in their own half.
Bragantino awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 4, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Corner awarded to Bragantino.
Goal! The home team take a 1-0 lead through Leo Ortiz.
In the minute 5, Ligger instrumental with a fine assist.
Bragantino's Alerrandro gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Ceara defender.
Can Bragantino get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Ceara's half?
In the minute 9, Jefferson Ferreira de Moraes signals a free kick to Ceara in their own half.
Bragantino's Artur misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Ceara at Nabizao.
In the minute 12, Bragantino's Lucas Evangelista gets in a shot on goal at Nabizao. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Ball safe as Bragantino is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Bragantino in their own half.
In the minute 13, Jefferson Ferreira de Moraes awards the home team a throw-in.
Ceara to take a throw-in in Bragantino territory.
Bragantino have a goal kick.
In the minute 14, Throw-in for Ceara in the half of Bragantino.
Free kick for Ceara in the half of Bragantino.
Throw-in for Bragantino at Nabizao.
In the minute 17, Ball goes out of play for a Ceara goal kick.
Ceara are in shooting range from this free kick.
Ceara to take a throw-in in Bragantino territory.
In the minute 19, Can Ceara get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bragantino's half?
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Jefferson Ferreira de Moraes awards Bragantino a goal kick.
In the minute 20, Goal! Vinicius Goes levels the match at 1-1.
Samuel Xavier with an assist there.
Free kick Ceara.
In the minute 23, Jefferson Ferreira de Moraes signals a free kick to Bragantino in their own half.
Bragantino take a 2-1 lead thanks to Bruno Tubarao.
Artur for Bragantino drives towards goal at Nabizao. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 24, Jefferson Ferreira de Moraes signals a Ceara throw-in in Bragantino's half.
Throw-in Bragantino.
Ceara drive forward but Cleber Bomfim is judged offside.
In the minute 26, Ceara awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ceara will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Bragantino.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Braganca Paulista to check on Alerrandro, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 27, Luiz Otavio is booked for the away team.
Bragantino's Claudinho is on target but unsuccessful.
Alerrandro is back on the pitch.
In the minute 30, Throw-in for Ceara at Nabizao.
In Braganca Paulista a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 31, In Braganca Paulista Ceara drive forward through Vinicius Goes. His shot is on target but it's saved.
At Nabizao, Claudinho has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Ceara have been awarded a corner by Jefferson Ferreira de Moraes.
Charles (Ceara) gets in a header on goal but the attempt is cleared.
In the minute 32, Free kick for Ceara in their own half.
Throw-in for Ceara in the half of Bragantino.
Corner awarded to Ceara.
In the minute 34, Leandro Carvalho of Ceara smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Can Bragantino get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Ceara's half?
Jefferson Ferreira de Moraes signals a free kick to Ceara.
In the minute 37, Bragantino awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ceara to take a throw-in in Bragantino territory.
Bragantino are coming forward and Bruno Tubarao gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 37, It's a goal kick for the away team in Braganca Paulista.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Ceara close to the penalty box.
In the minute 40, Ceara pushes forward through Vinicius Goes, whose finish on goal is saved.
Ceara have been awarded a corner by Jefferson Ferreira de Moraes.
Bragantino awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 41, Throw-in Ceara.
Bragantino's Bruno Tubarao has run offside.
Can Ceara capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 43, Ceara surge into the attack at Nabizao but Cleber Bomfimâ€™s header is off-target.
Corner awarded to Ceara.
In Braganca Paulista, Luiz Otavio of Ceara is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 45, Ceara have been awarded a corner by Jefferson Ferreira de Moraes.
Jefferson Ferreira de Moraes awards Bragantino a goal kick.
Throw-in for Bragantino in their own half.
The fourth official's board shows 4 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Artur of Bragantino gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Braganca Paulista.
Jefferson Ferreira de Moraes signals a free kick to Ceara.
Free kick for Bragantino in their own half.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Bragantino in the half of Ceara.
The first-half has come to a close in Braganca Paulista.
It's now 3-1 in Braganca Paulista as Alerrandro scores for Bragantino.
In the minute 45, That's a fine assist from Bruno Tubarao.
In the minute 45, Ricardo Ryller (Bragantino) gets a yellow card. He will be suspended from the next match!
Martha (Ceara) gets a yellow card.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
Jefferson Ferreira de Moraes signals a Ceara throw-in in Bragantino's half.
In the minute 46, Fernando Sobral is replacing Vinicius Lima for the away team.
William Oliveira is replacing Martha for Ceara at Nabizao.
In the minute 47, Throw-in for Ceara in the half of Bragantino.
Jefferson Ferreira de Moraes signals a Ceara throw-in in Bragantino's half.
In Braganca Paulista Ceara attack through Cleber Bomfim. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 47, Bragantino have a goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In Braganca Paulista a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 50, Bragantino have been awarded a corner by Jefferson Ferreira de Moraes.
Free kick Ceara.
Can Ceara capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Bragantino's half?
In the minute 51, Can Ceara get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bragantino's half?
Ceara are pushing forward but Leandro Carvalho's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Bragantino goal kick.
In the minute 52, Free kick for Ceara in the half of Bragantino.
Lucas Evangelista (Bragantino) has received a first yellow card.
Ceara to take a throw-in in Bragantino territory.
In the minute 54, Jefferson Ferreira de Moraes signals a free kick to Bragantino in their own half.
Free kick Bragantino.
Mauricio Barbieri (Bragantino) is making a first substitution, with Aderlan replacing Ricardo Ryller.
In the minute 56, Jefferson Ferreira de Moraes signals a free kick to Ceara in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Bragantino in Braganca Paulista.
Ball safe as Ceara is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 57, Jefferson Ferreira de Moraes awards the home team a throw-in.
Bragantino are pushing forward but Lucas Evangelista's finish is wide of the goal.
Jefferson Ferreira de Moraes awards Ceara a goal kick.
In the minute 60, Corner awarded to Bragantino.
Throw-in for Bragantino in the half of Ceara.
Alerrandro (Bragantino) fires in a shot â€“ and hits the post!
In the minute 62, Ceara have been awarded a corner by Jefferson Ferreira de Moraes.
Corner awarded to Ceara.
Bragantino drives forward and Alerrandro gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 63, Can Ceara get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bragantino's half?
Goal! Lucas Evangelista extends Bragantino's lead to 4-1.
Great play from Alerrandro to set up the goal.
In the minute 67, Throw-in for Bragantino at Nabizao.
Jefferson Ferreira de Moraes signals a Ceara throw-in in Bragantino's half.
Bruno Tubarao (Bragantino) gets in a great strike â€“ straight into the post! Ohhhh so close!
Corner awarded to Bragantino.
In the minute 68, Guto Ferreira is making the team's third substitution at Nabizao with Eduardo replacing Samuel Xavier.
Jefferson Ferreira de Moraes signals a free kick to Ceara.
In the minute 70, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Ceara in the half of Bragantino.
Bragantino make their third substitution with Luis Phelipe replacing Claudinho.
In the minute 71, Matheus Jesus is on a sub for Lucas Evangelista for Bragantino.
Vinicius Goes (Ceara) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Important block from the Bragantino defence as Vinicius Goes fires in a strike for Ceara.
In the minute 72, Ceara have been awarded a corner by Jefferson Ferreira de Moraes.
Bragantino have a goal kick.
Ceara to take a throw-in in Bragantino territory.
Ceara to take a throw-in in Bragantino territory.
In the minute 76, The away team have replaced Leandro Carvalho with Felipe Silva. This is the fourth substitution made today by Guto Ferreira.
The away team replace Vinicius Goes with Wescley.
In the minute 77, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Bragantino in their own half.
Cleber Bomfim gets his shot on target but fails to score for Ceara.
In the minute 78, Throw-in Bragantino.
Can Bragantino get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Ceara's half?
In Braganca Paulista a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 80, Jefferson Ferreira de Moraes signals a Ceara throw-in in Bragantino's half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Braganca Paulista.
Bragantino are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
In the minute 82, Ceara drives forward and Fernando Sobral gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Felipe Silva for Ceara gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Bragantino goal kick.
In the minute 83, Goal kick for Ceara at Nabizao.
Ceara are coming forward and Wescley gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Bragantino at Nabizao.
In the minute 84, Free kick for Ceara in their own half.
The home team replace Alerrandro with Jan Hurtado.
The home team have replaced Bruno Tubarao with Luan Candido. This is the fifth substitution made today by Mauricio Barbieri.
In the minute 85, Ceara push forward at Nabizao and Cleber Bomfim gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Bragantino defence.
Ceara have been awarded a corner by Jefferson Ferreira de Moraes.
Bragantino awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 86, In Braganca Paulista a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Throw-in for Ceara close to the penalty box.
Bragantino awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 88, Jefferson Ferreira de Moraes signals a free kick to Ceara.
Bragantino's Luan Candido has been booked in Braganca Paulista.
Goal! Wescley pulls one back for Ceara to make it 4-2.
In the minute 89, That's a fine assist from Bruno Pacheco.
Jefferson Ferreira de Moraes awards the away team a throw-in.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 5 minutes of added time.
Jefferson Ferreira de Moraes signals a free kick to Bragantino in their own half.
Corner awarded to Bragantino.
Ball goes out of play for a Ceara goal kick.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 4-2.
Charles for Ceara has been booked by Jefferson Ferreira de Moraes and receives a first yellow card.
